title: (x) Mister Cartoon tattoo script - hand drawn {Stephen}
content:
hi guys! i’m doing a school project to make an exhibition for Mister Cartoon  
i want to make the title using the same font he uses like this :

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090830045516im_/http:/typophile.com/files/cartoonw_6339.jpg)

i wonder if you guys can help me identify a font that looks like it

thanks a lot!
author: erlina_kath03

comments.content: I’m guessing this was rendered by hand, but you also might like [Skin Deep](http://web.archive.org/web/20090830045516/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/blambot/skin-deep-bb/?refby=typographica).
Not sure about this specific script, but for similars you could try Sudtipos’ Buffet or Affair or Gábor Kóthay’s wonderful Zanzibar.

wow, thanks a lot... :)  
i think i’m going to mix those fonts and hand rendered it myself.

thanks again!

Late response, but it looks like a Hydro74 type style.

Take a look, [http://hydro74.com/H74/typetreatments.php](http://web.archive.org/web/20090830045516/http:/hydro74.com/H74/typetreatments.php "http://hydro74.com/H74/typetreatments.php")

Late response, but it looks like a Hydro74 type style.

Take a look, [http://hydro74.com/H74/typetreatments.php](http://web.archive.org/web/20090830045516/http:/hydro74.com/H74/typetreatments.php "http://hydro74.com/H74/typetreatments.php")
Glad I fount this page....the link above was great!!!
